plugin.name: AltLangTest
plugin.description: Base plugin for alternative, scripting languages that run on the JVM

c:simple-property.name: scriptsDirectory
c:simple-property.description: The directory on the classpath in which scripts can be found. This can be in a JAR file or in an exploded format on the file system. It defaults to the package as specifified in the package attribute in the top-level plugin element of the descriptor.

c:simple-property.name: lang
c:simple-property.description: The language in which the scripts are written. More importantly, this determines which script engine to load.
